item.title: Storing data in Azure
item.description: Introduction Method Storing fundamentals data Storing stock prices Result Historical stock prices Fundamental stock data Introduction In this post I will give an example of one way to store data into a Microsoft SQL server located on the Azure cloud. I will do this both for the fundamentals data from an earlier post but also for the price data, also from an earlier post. The storing procedure will look identical for both cases.
